attributes.action: Ban the building of property in gardens or fields without knocking down anything else
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If people keep building in gardens and fields there will be no more land left in the country.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nospace/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
